scripts.db:create: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="--require ts-node/register/transpile-only --require dotenv/config" sequelize-cli db:create
scripts.db:drop: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="--require ts-node/register/transpile-only --require dotenv/config" sequelize-cli db:drop
scripts.migrate: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="--require ts-node/register/transpile-only --require dotenv/config" sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop || true && npm run db:create && npm run db:sync
